mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT my_emp.emp_id, my_emp.emp_num, my_emp.emp_nm, my_emp.emp_dep_nm || ' ' || my_emp.emp_team_nm AS dep_nm,
vs.prd_code, vs.prd_nm, vs.prd_color || ' / ' || vs.prd_size || 'mm / ' || vs.prd_height || 'ea' AS prd_option,
wp.wpo_id, wp.wrk_id, wp.wpo_ocount, wp.wpo_jcount, wp.wpo_end_date,
CASE WHEN wp.wpo_status = 'wpo_sts_02' THEN 1 WHEN wp.wpo_status = 'wpo_sts_03' THEN 2 ELSE 99 END AS status_priority,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY my_emp.emp_id ORDER BY CASE WHEN wp.wpo_status = 'wpo_sts_02' THEN 1 WHEN wp.wpo_status = 'wpo_sts_03' THEN 2 ELSE 99 END, wp.wpo_end_date DESC NULLS LAST ) AS rn FROM ( SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_num, e.emp_nm, e.emp_dep_nm, e.emp_team_nm, emp.emp_dep_cd, emp.emp_team_cd FROM VIEW_EMPLOYEE e JOIN EMPLOYEE emp ON e.emp_id = emp.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{empId} ) my_emp LEFT JOIN work_process wp ON TRIM(LOWER(wp.wpo_team)) = TRIM(LOWER(my_emp.emp_team_cd)) LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON wp.wrk_id = wo.wrk_id LEFT JOIN process p ON wo.prc_id = p.prc_id AND p.det_id = my_emp.emp_dep_cd LEFT JOIN vw_suju_summary vs ON wo.odd_id = vs.odd_id ) WHERE rn = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_report(wpo_id, emp_id, wre_jcount, wre_date, wre_memo) VALUES (#{wpoId}, #{empId}, #{wreJcount}, #{wreDate}, #{wreMemo})
mapper.select: SELECT wre_id, wpo_id, wre_jcount, wre_date, wre_memo FROM work_report WHERE emp_id=#{empId} AND wpo_id=#{wpoId} ORDER BY wre_id desc OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
